Convert distance into meters

Source: R/utils.R
convert_distance.Rd

Convert distance into meters

convert_distance(
  distance,
  distance_unit = c("meters", "m", "kilometers", "km", "miles", "mi", "feet", "ft",
    "inches", "in")
)

Arguments

distance

The numeric distance to be converted to meters
distance_unit

A string indicating the units to convert distance from

Value

A numeric vector of distances, converted into meters.

See also

Other utilities: addbuff, calc_haversine_distance(), deg_to_rad(), get_bbox_centroid(), get_bbox(), point_from_distance(), rad_to_deg()

Examples

convert_distance(100, "miles")

#> [1] 160934.4
